comment:
* An entity class that is passed to the 
 * {@link DrmManagerClient.OnInfoListener#onInfo onInfo()} callback.
 *
 * @deprecated Please use {@link android.media.MediaDrm}

variables.name: TYPE_ALREADY_REGISTERED_BY_ANOTHER_ACCOUNT
variables.comment: * The registration has already been done by another account ID.

variables.name: TYPE_REMOVE_RIGHTS
variables.comment: * The rights need to be removed completely.

variables.name: TYPE_RIGHTS_INSTALLED
variables.comment: * The rights have been successfully downloaded and installed.

variables.name: TYPE_WAIT_FOR_RIGHTS
variables.comment:
* The rights object is being delivered to the device. You must wait before
     * calling {@link DrmManagerClient#acquireRights acquireRights()} again.

variables.name: TYPE_ACCOUNT_ALREADY_REGISTERED
variables.comment: * The registration has already been done for the given account.

methods.name: private void checkTypeValidity(int type)
methods.comment:
* Check the validity of the given type.
     * To overcome a design flaw, we need also accept the type constants
     * defined in super class, DrmEvent.
